name: The Last Mile
description:
Single developer game jam entry for the Unreal Engine 4 2021 Megajam.

All assets, including UI/Audio/Textures/Effects/Meshes/etc, were made by the developer (me) during the jam.

A bit of a mashup between an infinite runner and a bullet hell, drive your delivery robot to avoid the lasers of an invasion force while navigating an increasingly narrow bridge.

If your pathetic robot body fails, not to worry! There are more delivery robots waiting in the wings. But be warned, they'll have to navigate the narrow bridge around your shattered robot corpse.
